query.name: add_combo
query.sql: SELECT distinct concat(concat(b.branch_code,'-'),b.branch_name) course_name, t.course_id FROM fnd_course t,fnd_branch b WHERE t.branch_id = b.branch_id AND t.enable_flag = 'Y' AND t.teacher_id = (SELECT te.teacher_id FROM fnd_teacher te WHERE te.teacher_code = ${@user_code} ) and t.class_id =${@class_id} ORDER BY b.branch_code

query.name: combo
query.sql: SELECT distinct concat(concat(b.branch_code,'-'),b.branch_name) course_name, t.course_id FROM fnd_course t,fnd_branch b WHERE t.branch_id = b.branch_id AND t.enable_flag = 'Y' AND t.teacher_id = (SELECT te.teacher_id FROM fnd_teacher te WHERE te.teacher_code = ${@user_code} ) ORDER BY b.branch_code

query.name: student_combo
query.sql: SELECT concat(concat(b.branch_code,'-'),b.branch_name) course_name, t.course_id FROM fnd_course t,fnd_branch b WHERE t.branch_id = b.branch_id AND t.enable_flag = 'Y' AND t.class_id = (SELECT c.class_id FROM fnd_class c,fnd_student s WHERE c.class_id= s.class_id and s.student_code = ${@user_code} ) ORDER BY b.branch_code
